2289.verse: وَأَنذِرْهُمْ|And warn them|120|129|11193$يَوْمَ|(of the) Day|102|120|1057$ٱلْحَسْرَةِ|(of) the Regret,|125|143|11194$إِذْ|when|55|73|1198$قُضِىَ|has been decided|136|154|8174$ٱلْأَمْرُ|the matter.|96|105|5439$وَهُمْ|And they|80|97|256$فِى|(are) in|69|102|89$غَفْلَةٍ|heedlessness,|112|145|11195$وَهُمْ|and they|79|112|256$لَا|(do) not|75|108|30$يُؤْمِنُونَ|believe.|94|111|35$

2290.verse: إِنَّا|Indeed, We|96|103|120$نَحْنُ|[We]|62|75|103$نَرِثُ|[We] will inherit|124|137|11196$ٱلْأَرْضَ|the earth|92|105|197$وَمَنْ|and whoever|105|118|1012$عَلَيْهَا|(is) on it,|82|95|1269$وَإِلَيْنَا|and to Us|84|91|11197$يُرْجَعُونَ|they will be returned.|162|162|3066$

2295.verse: يَـٰٓأَبَتِ|O my father!|104|116|8800$إِنِّىٓ|Indeed, I|80|104|312$أَخَافُ|[I] fear|76|100|4898$أَن|that|48|72|655$يَمَسَّكَ|will touch you|112|136|11208$عَذَابٌ|a punishment|108|132|72$مِّنَ|from|50|62|156$ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ|the Most Gracious,|145|178|3$فَتَكُونَ|so you would be|128|194|4904$لِلشَّيْطَـٰنِ|to the Shaitaan|124|190|11209$وَلِيًّا|a friend."|80|113|4037$

2296.verse: قَالَ|He said,|73|85|309$أَرَاغِبٌ أَنتَ|"Do you hate|137|160|11210$عَنْ|(from)|61|84|1105$ءَالِهَتِى|my gods,|87|110|11211$يَـٰٓإِبْرَٲهِيمُ‌ۖ|O Ibrahim?|106|129|8629$لَئِن|Surely, if|79|102|4795$لَّمْ|not|42|54|63$تَنتَهِ|you desist|88|108|11212$لَأَرْجُمَنَّكَ‌ۖ|surely, I will stone you,|175|216|11213$وَٱهْجُرْنِى|so leave me|115|156|11214$مَلِيًّا|(for) a prolonged time."|175|195|11215$

2298.verse: وَأَعْتَزِلُكُمْ|And I will leave you|149|161|11218$وَمَا|and what|82|107|46$تَدْعُونَ|you invoke|91|116|5577$مِن دُونِ|besides|101|126|224$ٱللَّهِ|Allah|53|78|2$وَأَدْعُواْ|and I will invoke|126|138|11219$رَبِّى|my Lord.|77|83|2902$عَسَىٰٓ|May be|73|86|4255$أَلَّآ|that not|75|88|2011$أَكُونَ|I will be|71|84|661$بِدُعَآءِ|in invocation|104|117|11220$رَبِّى|(to) my Lord|103|116|2902$شَقِيًّا|unblessed."|95|101|11078$

2299.verse: فَلَمَّا|So when|77|101|141$ٱعْتَزَلَهُمْ|he left them|101|149|11221$وَمَا|and what|82|130|46$يَعْبُدُونَ|they worshipped|129|177|8757$مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ|besides Allah,|143|167|2971$وَهَبْنَا|[and] We bestowed|151|159|11222$لَهُۥٓ|[to] him|73|90|977$إِسْحَـٰقَ|Ishaq|87|104|5788$وَيَعْقُوبَ‌ۖ|and Yaqub,|100|117|1235$وَكُلاًّ|and each (of them)|149|166|4352$جَعَلْنَا|We made|81|89|1137$نَبِيًّا|a Prophet.|89|89|11175$

2300.verse: وَوَهَبْنَا|And We bestowed|140|158|5787$لَهُم|to them|72|109|98$مِّن|of|50|87|53$رَّحْمَتِنَا|Our Mercy,|93|130|11223$وَجَعَلْنَا|and We made|110|147|4805$لَهُمْ|for them|76|94|98$لِسَانَ صِدْقٍ|a truthful mention,|144|380|11224$عَلِيًّا|high.|59|295|3969$

2289.verse: And warn them, [O Muhammad], of the Day of Regret, when the matter will be concluded; and [yet], they are in [a state of] heedlessness, and they do not believe.

2290.verse: Indeed, it is We who will inherit the earth and whoever is on it, and to Us they will be returned.

2291.verse: And mention in the Book [the story of] Abraham. Indeed, he was a man of truth and a prophet.

2292.verse: [Mention] when he said to his father, "O my father, why do you worship that which does not hear and does not see and will not benefit you at all?

2293.verse: O my father, indeed there has come to me of knowledge that which has not come to you, so follow me; I will guide you to an even path.

2294.verse: O my father, do not worship Satan. Indeed Satan has ever been, to the Most Merciful, disobedient.

2295.verse: O my father, indeed I fear that there will touch you a punishment from the Most Merciful so you would be to Satan a companion [in Hellfire]."

2296.verse: [His father] said, "Have you no desire for my gods, O Abraham? If you do not desist, I will surely stone you, so avoid me a prolonged time."

2297.verse: [Abraham] said, "Peace will be upon you. I will ask forgiveness for you of my Lord. Indeed, He is ever gracious to me.

2298.verse: And I will leave you and those you invoke other than Allah and will invoke my Lord. I expect that I will not be in invocation to my Lord unhappy."

2299.verse: So when he had left them and those they worshipped other than Allah, We gave him Isaac and Jacob, and each [of them] We made a prophet.

2300.verse: And We gave them of Our mercy, and we made for them a reputation of high honor.

2301.verse: And mention in the Book, Moses. Indeed, he was chosen, and he was a messenger and a prophet.
